issue.title: [CF 766] Rain of fire tracking
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.1.5

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

This one has me a lil' stumped. I've tried tracking spell cast and other things that work for most situations but I just cannot get the icon to do anything, so am looking for some assistance. Rain of fire for Destruction warlocks is just a click and cast now, not channeled. Once you click and target an area it casts for roughly 7 seconds (haste affects it) but it is not a toggle, which is where I am not sure what to do. I don't need to know when it is casting necessarily, but want to have a reminder to know after roughly 7 seconds of a cast to cast it again.

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user Maven79 | Imported from CurseForge issue #766 | Raw

comments.body:
Also had one quick question. Found this on another post you made

``` [AltP("player", 14)] ```

for tracking Burning Embers. Love it but wondered if you know off hand if you can track burning ember shards? I could not find that in dogtags so maybe they have not added it. Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Maven79
